description:
This dashboard provides basic performance metrics for mysql/mariadb.

Uses telegraf built-in plugin

targets.query: select derivative(mean(connections), 1s) from "mysql" WHERE  "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(max_used_connections) from "mysql" WHERE "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select mean("value") from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Threads_connected' AND "type" = 'gauge' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select mean("value") from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Threads_running' AND "type" = 'gauge' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "mysql_value" WHERE "instance" = 'status' AND "type_instance" = 'Uptime' AND "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT last(value) FROM "mysql_value" WHERE "instance" = 'status' AND "type" = 'counter' AND  "type_instance" = 'Queries' AND "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

select derivative(mean("value"),1s)*8 from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Bytes_sent' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_received"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select derivative(mean("value"),1s) from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Table_locks_immediate' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select derivative(mean("value"),1s) from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Table_locks_waited' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select derivative(mean("value"),1s) from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Select_full_join' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select derivative(mean("value"),1s) from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Select_full_range_join' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "database_type" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "mysql" WITH KEY = "database_type"

list.name: database
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "mysql" WITH KEY = "database_type"

title: Service - MySQL Metrics
